ghosts.description: Vecna comes from Dungeons & Dragons, and in the game's lore is described as a once human turned undead wizard.

I’d also probably confuse heaven for a library if I were dead and could walk through walls. She’s pretty chill in the movies, but in the Library level of the video game she’s a truly superior Big Bad.
A very welcome ghost is that of an unknown man who appears at the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane, London. His appearance at a play is a sure sign that the play will be a huge success.

Myrtle was one of the biggest creeps in the whole Harry Potter series, but I guess Harry would have died in the second challenge in the Triwizard Tournament if she hadn’t been stalking him and Cedric.

The moral of this story is when a homeless ghost shows up strumming her guitar and reminding you that anyone can end up on the streets, you gotta give her your new Doc Martens and be a better friend to Ricky.

The Otis family moves into a castle that's haunted by a dead nobleman, who, much to his growing annoyance, cannot scare them no matter how hard he tries, and instead, it's the family who ends up spooking the ghost.

Ghost Lily Tomlin tries to make Mulder and Scully kill each other so she can hang out with Gillian Anderson in the afterlife, but she really only ends up pushing those two crazy kids closer together at Christmas time. Nice try, though, Lils. Can’t blame a girl for trying.

Before that fateful day on December 8, though, John said he say a 'crying lady ghost' walking the halls, and afterward Yoko, who still resides there, claimed she saw John's ghost sitting at his piano and that he said to her: 'Don't be afraid. I am still with you.'

ghosts.ghostName: Freddy Krueger in A Nightmare on Elm Streets
ghosts.description: The Otis family moves into a castle that's haunted by a dead nobleman, who, much to his growing annoyance, cannot scare them no matter how hard he tries, and instead, it's the family who ends up spooking the ghost.
Spanish genre film-makers do it again with Alejandro Amenábar’s haunted house mystery.
Looking into the bathroom mirror and saying “Candyman” five times will summon the hook-handed ghost of a black artist (Tony Todd) murdered by a lynch mob. Go on and say it, I dare you.
the Mind Flayer is a monster that possesses a host, and uses its body as a vessel to carry out its evil.
God, or some manifestation of his/her spirit, is floating around and unafraid to make its presence known in the second season of Fleabag. Making out with a priest?
The ghost of Denny Duquette was a breaking point for a lot of Grey’s Anatomy fans. Sometimes he appeared as a vision when someone died.
